messages.subject: Re: More confirmation for Homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: It s so wierd to come home and find this article on my email.  My in-laws just told me about this.  They live just a few miles from there and asked me if I had
messages.messageBody:
It's so wierd to come home and find this article on my email. My in-laws just told me about this. They live just a few miles from there and asked me if I had heard about it. This is the kind of town where "regular" hard working families live - probably like where most of us live. It's just sad. I am so glad I have the priviledge of staying home with my kids and protecting them from a lot of this. Can you imagine what a tragedy like this does to those little minds and emotions?

Betsy Wright

The Wright Way To Homeschool
http://www.angelfire.com/fl3/homeschoolingwrights
email: deejay@...
I can do everything through Him who strengthens me. Phillipians 4:13

messages.messageBody:
I just read some horrible news!

http://news.excite.com/news/ap/000229/15/news-school-shooting

This just reconfirms my choice to homeschool! And if this can happen in a
FIRST grade, then I don't even want to CONSIDER letting them go to high
school!

~`*S*`~
